modelView:
{
      "type": "page",
      "name": "bcmPersonSearch",
      "scriptingLanguage": "JavaScript",
      "components": [
            {
                  "name": "personSearch1",
                  "type": "resource",
                  "resource": "virtualDomains.bcmPersonSearch"
            },
            {
                  "name": "filterForm",
                  "type": "form",
                  "nextButtonLabel": "Next",
                  "showInitially": true,
                  "components": [
                        {
                              "name": "banner_id_f",
                              "type": "text",
                              "label": "Banner ID",
                              "parameters": {},
                              "required": false,
                              "loadInitially": true,
                              "value": "",
                              "style": "columns-2",
                              "validation": {}
                        },
                        {
                              "name": "last_name_f",
                              "type": "text",
                              "parameters": {},
                              "required": false,
                              "loadInitially": true,
                              "label": "Last Name",
                              "style": "columns-2",
                              "validation": {}
                        },
                        {
                              "name": "birth_date_min_f",
                              "type": "datetime",
                              "label": "Minimum birth date:",
                              "parameters": {},
                              "required": false,
                              "loadInitially": true,
                              "style": "columns-2",
                              "validation": {}
                        },
                        {
                              "name": "birth_date_max_f",
                              "type": "datetime",
                              "label": "Maximum birth date:",
                              "parameters": {},
                              "required": false,
                              "loadInitially": true,
                              "style": "columns-2",
                              "validation": {},
                              "readonly": false
                        }
                  ],
                  "label": "Search Criteria",
                  "style": ""
            },
            {
                  "name": "searchResultsBlock",
                  "type": "block",
                  "showInitially": true,
                  "components": [
                        {
                              "name": "applyFilter",
                              "type": "button",
                              "label": "Apply filter",
                              "onClick": "$searchResults.$load()"
                        },
                        {
                              "name": "searchResults",
                              "type": "grid",
                              "model": "personSearch1",
                              "label": "Matching people",
                              "parameters": {
                                    "spriden_id": "$banner_id_f",
                                    "spriden_last_name": "$last_name_f",
                                    "spbpers_birth_date_min": "$birth_date_min_f",
                                    "spbpers_birth_date_max": "$birth_date_max_f"
                              },
                              "allowNew": false,
                              "allowModify": false,
                              "allowDelete": false,
                              "allowReload": false,
                              "pageSize": 10,
                              "loadInitially": false,
                              "components": [
                                    {
                                          "name": "SPRIDEN_ID",
                                          "type": "display",
                                          "model": "SPRIDEN_ID",
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "asHtml": false,
                                          "label": "Banner ID"
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME",
                                          "type": "display",
                                          "label": "Last Name",
                                          "model": "SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME",
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "asHtml": false
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME",
                                          "type": "display",
                                          "label": "First Name",
                                          "model": "SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME",
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "asHtml": false
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "SPBPERS_BIRTH_DATE",
                                          "type": "datetime",
                                          "label": "Birth Date",
                                          "model": "SPBPERS_BIRTH_DATE",
                                          "loadInitially": true,
                                          "required": false,
                                          "parameters": {}
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "EXCLUDE_PERSON",
                                          "type": "boolean",
                                          "label": "Exclude",
                                          "readonly": false,
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    }
                              ]
                        }
                  ]
            }
      ],
      "title": "Person Search"
}
